text: Black Butterflies is a 2011 Dutch South African biographical drama movie directed by Paula van der Oest and starring Carice van Houten, Rutger Hauer, Liam Cummingham, Nicholas Pauling. ==Other websites== * Category:2011 drama movies Category:2010s biographical movies Category:Dutch biographical movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:South African biographical movies Category:South African drama movies Category:Movies directed by Paula van der Oest
title: Black Butterflies
